articles.title: 'I love you, goodbye': TikToker shares what it's like losing her best friend, 22, to suicide - AsiaOne
articles.description: This World Mental Health Day (Oct 10), AsiaOne speaks to a suicide survivor who wants to raise mental health awareness in Singapore. A montage of two best friends having the time of their lives would put a smile on many people's faces, but one such TikTok vid…
articles.content:
